text.eng: They condemned police brutality.

text.lug: Abo abaawaayo okusaba kwabwe okw'omulimu kyali kibeetaagisa n'okubaako ebirala bye bawandiika ebiboogerako.

text.teo: Aponi kolimokinai itunga luamootos aswam ainakin ibaluwanakec keda apapulai nuka esomero.

text.lug: Twetaaga abasomesa abamalirivu okusomesa mu bibiina eby'akamalirizo.
text.ach: Wamito lupwonye ma keto cwiny gi wek gupwony lutino ma cito katimo peny me agiki
text.teo: Ikoto iso isisianakinak lu emonokina aisisianakin esisiak lu angetakinak.
text.lgg: Ale ki imba'ba eyi owi pi azini ra 'diyi kilasi anzi depi dede 'diyini ri imbazu i

text.eng: The number of illiterates is alarming.

text.lgg: Ba sukulu lapi ku 'diyi ma kalafe oriori ru

text.eng: Political analysts are concerned with the opposition's separation.
text.lug: Abeekenneenya eby'obufuzi beeraliikirivu olw'enjawukana eziri mu b'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti.
text.ach: Ludiro kacel ki lumii tam I kom cungu iwi bye tye ki lworo I kom konne pa dul pa joma pe giyee ki lok pa gamente.
text.teo: Iyalongongosi angicak nuka politikis kanu atiakatiaka naejai kiding ipatei luka etepegak.
text.lgg: Ba egata fepi e'yo politikini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ovu asi otiza be esele coza 'ba ageti otizni 'diyinirisi
text.nyn: Abakugu omu by'obutegyeki bakwatsirweho okwahukana kw'ebibina ebirikuhakanitsya gavumenti.

text.eng: We had to reduce our wedding guest list to twenty people because of the pandemic.
text.lug: Twalina okukendeeza omuwendo gw'abantu ab'okuba ku mbaga yaffe okutuuka ku bantu abiri olw'ekirwadde.
text.ach: Wadwoko wel dano ma gibibedo i nyom i pyeraryo pi two korona.
text.teo: Apotu iso etidisiasi ipejok lu apote opete toni akasaire kanu adek najaai akwapin kere.
text.lgg: Anga asi ru otile 'ba emupi ama vile omu oku bizaniri ma alia 'diyiniri omvi ecazu 'ba kali iri azo 'dezari ma e'yosi.
text.nyn: Tuka kyendeza orukarara rwa'abagyenyi beitu aha kugaitwa kuba amakumi abiri ahabwa pandemic.

text.eng: The biggest part of Kampala city is in Buganda kingdom.
text.lug: Ekitundu ekisinga obunene eky'ekibuga Kampala kiri mu bwakabaka bwa Buganda.
text.ach: Dit pa boma Kampala obedo I ngom ker pa Buganda.
text.teo: Atutubet napolon kakere nako site nako Kampala ngesi ajakanut nako Buganda.
text.lgg: Aku ambu Kampala ni ri ma kala ambo turi angu opi Buganda ni ri ma pala ri'i
text.nyn: Ekicweeka kiihango eky'orurembo rwa kampala kiri omu bwakaba bwa Buganda.

text.eng: He said he meant his words.

text.teo: Abala ngesi ebe ebuni ngesi aswam ngun.

text.eng: Everyone thought that his idea would work but it did not.

text.teo: Kanginitunganan abu komoom ebe ebuni aomisioitike aswam konye mam abu iswama.

text.nyn: Buri omwe akaba nateekateeka ngu ekiteekateeko kye nikiza kukora kwonka tikirakozire.

text.eng: The authors studied the incidence of corruption in local governments.

text.teo: Ejaasi apugan keda epelu lokaitac itunga luetiroritos ipurojektin ngun.

text.eng: Some people from Western Uganda like eating millet.

text.teo: Eminasi icetunga luko Agolitomei loka Uganda ainyam akima.
text.lgg: Ba engapi Uganda ma kalari etuni 'dezuria 'diyi le 'du nyaza tu.
text.nyn: Abantu abamwe kuruga omuri buregyegwaizooba bwa uganda nibakunda kurya oburo.

text.eng: All complaints regarding ambulance services should be forwarded to the district officials.

text.eng: The coronavirus spreads easily among crowds.
text.lug: Ekirwadde kya korona kisaasaana mangu nnyo awali abantu abangi.

text.teo: Ekora ekorona katipet kaiboisio nuipu itunga.

text.eng: Oil is the country's largest export.

text.eng: The president warned Rwanda's enemies from within and without.

text.eng: The Muslim youths were represented at the meeting.

text.nyn: Eminyeeto y'abasiraamu nayo ebaire eriho omurukiiko.

text.eng: Tanzania is not a landlocked country like Uganda.
text.lug: Tanzania teyeetoolooddwa nsi ndala nga Uganda.
text.ach: Tanzani obedo lobo ma tye cok ki pii madit ma kube ki lobe mukene ento uganda pe tye kit meno.
text.teo: Mam Tanzania erai akwap naegolikina kwape Uganda.
text.lgg: Tanzania adrini kari miri amboru 'diyini kalani alizu ku ekile Ugandale ku
text.nyn: Tanzania neeyatana n'enyanja empango kwonka Yuganda yo tikwo eri.

text.eng: Some girls have become pregnant during the lockdown.

text.teo: Apesur ace apotununutu kotoma apak nagolitere akwap.
text.lgg: Ezoanzi azi 'diyi eca okporozuru sawa angu ti opizaniri ma alia
text.nyn: Abeishiki abingi bagiiziire enda omu kwesibirana/lockdown.

text.eng: Uganda asked to join them in operations on the twenty-fifth of October but Beni declined.
text.lug: Uganda yasaba okubeegattako mu bikwekweto nga abiri mu ttaano Ogwekkumi naye Beni n'agaana.
text.ach: Uganda openyo gi wek edony I mony man inino dwe pyer aryo wiye abic me dwe me apar ento beni okwero
text.teo: Abu Uganda kingit alomar aimorikikin keda kes toma ojie kango akaisarei alukany Olap Loitomonet konye abu Beni konger.
text.lgg: Uganda zi yi emuzu fizu yivu 'yeta alia mma o'du kali drini towi mba mudrisi te Beni ga si
text.nyn: Uganda ekashaba kukwatanisa nabo  aha kya makumi abiri na bitaano kwonka Beni akaanga.

text.eng: By the look on her face, she is stressed.
text.lug: Endabika ye ey'oku maaso eraga nti alina ebimweraliikiriza.

text.nyn: Tiimu y'eishomero ryabo esingire empaka za hoki nyomwebazyo omu mwabazyo.

text.eng: The government will work with various organizations to develop the northern region.

text.ach: Yub manyen ne twero tero wel cente ma oo milyon mapol.
text.teo: Epote aitemonokineta ayangaikin imilionin luipu noi.
text.lgg: Geri o'di 'diri eco nga aje silingi ni nya milioni angiri
text.nyn: Omuringo omusya nigwija kumaraho obukaikuru bw'empiiha.

text.eng: He was called to the police station to give a statement.
text.lug: Yayitibwa ku poliisi okuwa sitatimenti.
text.ach: Kilwonge I polic ka coyo lok doge .
text.teo: Aponi konyaraunai ngesi polis kanu aiwadik akiroke.
text.lgg: Ba omve eri emuzu ti sizu polisia
text.nyn: Akeetwa aha pooriisi kukora sitatimenti

text.eng: Uganda should utilize technical solutions in the education sector.
text.lug: Uganda erina okukozesa amagezi ag'ekikugu mu kitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza.
text.ach: Uganda omyero otii ki kwan me tic cing ka gineno yoo me ilo malo rwom me kwan
text.teo: Ekot Uganda aitwasam iboro lu itegelikina kowai loka aisisia.
text.lgg: Le Uganda ma ayu ondua afa ndundu eyi edezu ri arakala onita niri ma alea i
text.nyn: Uganda eshemereire kwejunisa ebyemikono omu kitongore ky'eby'obwegyese.

text.eng: Why would the diocese be split?
text.lug: Lwaki obulabirizi bwawulwamu?
text.ach: Pingo mono kipoko i diocese?
text.teo: Kanuboinyo etiakar edaiosis
text.lgg: Ba di dayasesi awa a'du ma e'yosi?
text.nyn: Ahabw'enki obureeberezi nibwetaanisamu?

text.eng: People do not know what they want.
text.lug: Abantu tebamanyi kye baagala.
text.ach: Dano pe ngeyo ngo ma gimito
text.teo: Mam itunga ejenete iboro lu ekotosi.
text.lgg: Ba eyi nini afa eyini le 'diyi ku.
text.nyn: Abantu tibarikumanya ekibarikwenda.

text.eng: More petrol stations have been opened up on different roads in Uganda.
text.lug: Amasundiro g'amafuta mangi gagguddwawo ku makubo agatali gamu mu Uganda.
text.ach: Kiyabo ka mato moo pa motoka I teng gudu mapol I lobo Uganda.
text.teo: Apukor isitesens luipu luka akinyet korotin luegelegela koUganda.
text.lgg: Ba ozi pari odu ozizu 'diyi Ugandaa nzila ndu ndu 'diyi ama tisi
text.nyn: Amatundiro g'amajuta giigwirweho aha nguuto zitari zimwe omu Uganda.

text.eng: Weddings and funerals are used as campaign platforms by most politicians
text.lug: Embaga n'emikolo gy'okuziika gikozesebwa nga akatuuti k'okunoonyezaako obululu eri bannabyabufuzi abasinga.
text.ach: Lucungu iwi bye pol kare gitiyo ki ka nyome ki gangi lyel me cunu kwir
text.teo: Itosomaete ipolitisan aidayo keda imanyito kwape aibosio nuka ekampein
text.lgg: Ba politii ni 'diyi ma pari yi omu oku biza ni azini dra ni 'diyi ayu pari agbatara ti odaza ni 'diyi 'yezu
text.nyn: Emikoro yobugyenyi hamwe n'enfu  nibyejunisibwa omu kuronda obushagiki omu b'ebyobutegyeki abarikuronda akaruuru.

text.eng: He has very many rich friends.
text.lug: Alina emikwano mingi nnyo emigagga.
text.ach: En tye ki lureme mapol ma lulonyo.
text.teo: Ejaasi ngesi keda ipapero luipu noi luebaritos.
text.lgg: Eri ma agyipi mali be 'diyikarakarau
text.nyn: Ayine abanywani bingi abagaiga.

text.eng: Many people believed in him.
text.lug: Abantu bangi baali bamukkiririzaamu.
text.ach: Dano mapol obedo ki niyee I lok megge.
text.teo: Eyuunitos itunga luipu nuenera ngesi.
text.lgg: Ba kakau ovu andra asi baza be edri erini ma dria
text.nyn: Abantu bingi niba mwikiririzamu.

text.eng: We buy goods and sell them at a profit.
text.lug: Tugula ebyamaguzi ne tubitunda okufuna amagoba.
text.ach: Wawilo jami ka wa cato gi pi magoba
text.teo: Igweli iso iboro do agwelanar kanu adumun ameda.
text.lgg: Ama afa ozizaru 'diyi je ra, ama di eyi ozi orodri be
text.nyn: Nitugura ebintu tubiguza twiihamu amagoba.

text.eng: Muslims do not eat pork because it is a sin in their religion.
text.lug: Abasiraamu tebalya mbizzi olw'okuba kitwalibwa ng'ekibi mu ddiini yaabwe.
text.ach: Icilam pe gicamo ringo opego pien meno obedo bal botgi.
text.teo: Mam isiriamun eyamete akiring na epege naraai eraai adiakaru odinikes.
text.lgg: Isilamu nyani ezo za ku a'disiku eri ezatanii yi vile diniri ma alia.
text.nyn: Abasiramu tibarikurya mpuunu ahakuba n'ekibi omunyikiriza yaabo.

text.eng: They need to guide the community about the benefits they will receive.
text.lug: Beetaaga okuuulira abantu ku miganyulo gye bajja okufuna.
text.ach: omyero guniang lwak i kom jami ma beco ma gubi nongo
text.teo: Ekot kes aitetemikin itunga nuka ajokisio nu edumunete kesi.
text.lgg: Le eyi ma fe imbata ongulumu eyini drileba eyini nga esu 'diyi ma dria ra
text.nyn: Baine kuhwera abantu, okumanya emigasho eibarikwiija kutunga.

text.eng: When is the next Champions League?
text.lug: Ddi liigi ya bannantammegwa eddako lw'enneebaawo?
text.ach: Tuko odilo makwako team odilo ma gutye pyem I namba acel me o I angwen I gurupgi I lobo ulaya bitime awene?
text.teo: Iwori bo ejaikinotor aboliasio nuka abolobol naka etelekarak?
text.lgg: Avita Champions Leagueni vileri a'di ngare?
text.nyn: Kyampiyoni riigi erikukurataho ni eya ryari?

text.eng: Most of the manufacturing industries are privately owned.
text.lug: Amakolero agasinga obungi ga bwannanyini,
text.ach: Pol cuma mapat-pat me yubo jami obedo pa wegge/dano.
text.teo: Acuman nuipu nuitolomete iboro mam eraasi luka apugan.
text.lgg: Okalamvu afa e'de pi d'iyi ma pari yi 'ba yi ma ngulupi si 'diyi ni
text.nyn: Amakorero amaingi n'agabantu buntu.

text.eng: There will be scholarship programs for those who will excel.
text.lug: Wajja kubaawo pulogulaamu za sikaala eri abo abanaakola obulungi.
text.ach: Yub me kwan nono bi bedo tye pi jo ma bi timo maber
text.teo: Ejaunos scholarships kanu esisiak lu epote aswam ejok.
text.lgg: Otita 'ba agapi kililiru 'diyini sukulu lazu pirina 'diyi nga adri ci
text.nyn: Nihaza kubaho enteekateeka z'okwegyera busha ahari abo , abarikukora kurungi.

text.eng: There are checkpoints at every border district.
text.lug: Buli disitulikiti eri ku nsalo erina we bakeberera.
text.ach: Ka ngiyo luwot tye kaweng i districts matye i wang lobo
text.teo: Ipu roadblocks kangol eikoru lo edisitrikt.
text.lgg: Pari 'bani 'ba andrizu 'diyi distrikiti dria boda'a ri ma alea ci
text.nyn: Buri nsharo, eriho omwanya gw'okukyebereramu.

text.eng: Remember to cut your nails short.
text.lug: Jjukira okusala ku njala zo.
text.ach: Wii myero opoo me ngolo lwet cingi macego.
text.teo: Iituniete aikep akonibelekeka.
text.lgg: Mi ega e'yo mi ma onyofi yi olizu ali ra
text.nyn: Ijuuka kuchwa ebyara byawe.

text.eng: Governments and private entities make programs that do not take into account forest-dwelling people.
text.lug: Gavumenti n'ebitongole eby'obwannannyini bikola enteekateeka ezitakwata ku bantu abasaanyawo ebibira.
text.ach: Miri mapat-pat kacel ki dul bene mapat-pat ma pe obedo pa mirikatti ki yub mapat-pat ma pe tamo I kom dano ma kwo I bunga.
text.teo: Itolomununete iriongeta luka apugan keda luka itunga ainapeta numam epodokinitos itunga luiboiete kosiep keda ikibiran.
text.lgg: Yini azi otiria gamete amuti amveleru 'diyi pie egani e'yo o'bi oapi oce alea 'diyi ma dria ku.
text.nyn: Zagavumenti hamwe na ebitongore  by'obantu buntu bakora zaa puroguraamu ezi abantu ababeisibwaho ebibira bataganyirwamu.

text.eng: Boda Boda riders disregard traffic rules.
text.lug: Abavuzi ba boodabooda tebagoberera mateeka ga ku nguudo.
text.ach: Ludwo boda-boda pe woro cik me tic ki gudu.
text.teo: Mam ibodabodan epodokinitos ikisila luka irotin.
text.lgg: Boda boda onzu'ba 'diyi leni azita nzila dri ni 'diyi ma vuti obi ku.
text.nyn: Abavugi ba bodaboda tibarikukuratira mateeka g'ebiiruka.

text.eng: Five hundred six people are on antiretroviral drugs.
text.lug: Abantu bitaano mu mukaaga be bali ku ddagala eriweweeza akawuka.
text.ach: Dano miya bic ki abicel gitye i yat onyo ARV
text.teo: Itunga akwatakany ikanyape kes ilikete ikee luka adeka naka eiseny
text.lgg: Ba turu towi efi azia eyi aro izia niri oki
text.nyn: Abantu magana ataano na mukaaga, bari aha mibazi erikukyendeza akakooko ka siriimu.

text.eng: Many people never recover the expenses of the trial.
text.lug: Abantu bangi  tebaddizibwa ssente ze bakozesa mu kulabikako mu kkooti.
text.ach: Inge ngolokop, Pol dano pe twero nongo cente marom ki maguculu me laro lok ikot
text.teo: Itunga luipu mam inyakunete ikapun lu igaraman akaulo na aosan.
text.lgg: ꞌBa karakara yi esuni afa yini eza sawa eꞌyo lizaniria ꞌdiyi dika ku.
text.nyn: Baingi tibarikugaruka kutunga esente ezi bakoreise omu kuhurirwa kw'omushango.

text.eng: The pandemic would have run out of control but we managed to coerce it
text.lug: Ekirwadde bunnansi kyanditulemye okutangira naye twasobola okukirwanysa.
text.ach: Two ma oporo ni onongo kono okelo peko mawdong tutwal ento wanguku jwiko peko man
text.teo: Abeit adeka aroniar noi konye apotu oni apedosi aitikitik.
text.lgg: Azo onzi 'di ecota eca atri kokoru ra te ama arudrini eri omvizu ele ra.
text.nyn: Oburwaire bukaba nibuza kujanjaara munonga, kwonka tukabuzibira.

text.eng: It all seemed rehearsed.
text.lug: Byonna birabika byategekeddwa butegekebwa.
text.ach: Jami ne ducu onen calo gin makong gupwonye apwonya kit me timo ne.
text.teo: Asubitos bala nuetetemoritai sek.
text.lgg: Ena dria e'yo 'bani emba embani le.
text.nyn: Kikareebeka nk'ekirabirwemu.

text.eng: We have seen worse things this year.
text.lug: Tulabye ebintu ebibi ennyo omwaka guno.
text.ach: Waneno jami maraco adada I mwakani.
text.teo: Iwanyu oni iboro lueroko adepar kokaru kalo.
text.lgg: Andre afa ewaru yi eli 'di ma alia ra
text.nyn: Tureebire ebintu bibi ogu mwaka nangwa n'ebirikukira ahari eki.

text.eng: When we realized that the girl was not well, we took her to the hospital.
text.lug: Bwe twamanya nti omuwala tali bulungi, twamutwala mu ddwaliro.
text.ach: Ikare ma wanyiang ni anayaka-ni pe tye maber, watere I ot yat.
text.teo: Neijenunia sio ebe mama apese ngin engalaei, apotu sio ayangasi ngesi adekis.
text.lgg: Amani ndreria kini zamva ndari ovuni muke kuria, ama 'du eri ji arojoa.
text.nyn: Ku twakimanyire ngu omwishiki taine magara marungi,tukamwirukanguza omu irwariro

text.eng: Television stations employ news anchors to report and cover current situations.
text.lug: Ttivi zikozesa bannamawulire okugasaka n'okugafulumya nga gakwata ku mbeera eba eriwo.
text.ach: Citecen me telebijon coyo lukwan lok angea mapol me yenyo ki dwoko lok I kom ngo matye katimme kombedi
text.teo: Etacete isitesens luka etelebision asiomak iyemuto kanu aisiom keda airot akiro nuiswamasi.
text.lgg: Pari afa ondredrea ni televesion ru 'diyi niri 'ba e'yo la'ba 'diyi si e'yo idrizu azini ejizu afa yi 'yeba 'diyi ma dria
text.nyn: Ebitebe bya tiivi nibikoresa abashomi b'amahurire kushaka n'okushoma ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

text.eng: What are some of the commonly used herbs in Uganda?
text.lug: Ddagala ki ery'ekinnansi erisinga okukozesebwa mu Uganda?
text.ach: Yadi ango me tekwaro ma kitiyo kwede i Uganda?
text.teo: Ani bo ikee luetapit aitosom koUganda?
text.lgg: Aro nyakuni 'bani ayu tu Ugandaa 'diyi ma azi yi ngoyi?
text.nyn: Ni bishaka ki ebirikukinzayo kukoreesibwa omu Uganda?

text.eng: Our chairman is suspected to be behind a certain group of thieves in our area.
text.lug: Ssentebe waffe ateeberezebwa okuba emabega w'ekibinja ky'ababbi ekimu mu kitundu kyaffe.
text.ach: Byek tye ni won kom wa tye ka cwako gurup pa lukwo magitye i kabedo wa
text.teo: Eomitai ebe edapakina loapolon eicolong wok ogurupu lo ikokolak katutubet wok
text.lgg: Eri ena kile 'Bili ei amavileri ni ogua azi angu amavileri ma alea 'diyi ma drile ni
text.nyn: Mukuru wentebe waitu, nateekateekwaho kuba aine ekiguruupu ky'abashuma eki arikukorengana nakyo omukyanga kyaitu.

text.eng: Independence day celebrations were cancelled.
text.lug: Okujaguza kw'amefuga kwasazibwamu.
text.ach: Kingolo yub me kwero nino uhuru
text.teo: Aponi ikisarai asuban nuka aipugaikin bon.
text.lgg: Ba atri ndra omu o'du driwala niri inzizu 'diyi ci
text.nyn: Emikoro y'okujaguza okwetegyeka, ekashazibwamu.

text.eng: Some countries protect local companies from foreign competition.
text.lug: Ensi ezimu ziwa obukuumi kampuni za bannansi ne zitavuganyizibwa ezo eziva ebweru w'eggwanga.
text.ach: Lobe mogo gwoko dul me biyacara me lobogi I kom pyem matek ma dul me lobo mukene kelo.
text.teo: Akwapin ace eyuwanarete ikampuninikec kotoma abolobol naka akwapin nukokinga.
text.lgg: Kari azi 'diyi amuti kari ma alia ogogo 'diyi a'bu a'bala engazu amuti aniboo ru 'diyi vurisi ci
text.nyn: Amahanga agamwe nigarinda amakorero g'abantu baaryo okuhatana naago agaheeru.

text.eng: Many people were killed during the riots.
text.lug: Abantu bangi battibwa wakati mu bwegugungo.
text.ach: Kineko dano mapol ikare me jemo
text.teo: Aponi oyarai itunga luipu kapak na angurian.
text.lgg: Ba o'di 'ba karakara eyi ngiringiri eyi ma alea
text.nyn: Abantu baingi bakaitwa omu bwimukiriro.

text.eng: He lost his sight when he was still a baby.
text.lug: Yaziba amaaso bwe yali akyali muwere.
text.ach: En wange oto I kare ma en pud tidi.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kotwania akekonye nearaar ngesi ikoku.
text.lgg: Eri avi i ma mile angu ndrezuri de nga eri odekuani
text.nyn: Akahuma akiri omwereere.

text.eng: Kind people are always rewarded.
text.lug: Abantu ab'ekisa bawebwa ebirabo.
text.ach: Luber kit ipol kare wic poo i komgi
text.teo: Itunga lu esiaka eropionono.
text.lgg: Ba asi ndrizaru 'diyi o'du dria feta eyi esu ra
text.nyn: Abantu abaine embabazi buriijo nibasiimwa.

text.eng: Since the time of the early advertising-supported newspapers.
text.lug: Okuva edda okulanga ebyamaguzi kuwaniridde empapula z'amawulire.
text.ach: Nicake ikare macon ma onongo cato wil konyo gajeti
text.teo: Ageun kapakio nuka alimonor agwelanar kotoma apapulai nuka itemuto.
text.lgg: E'dozu andra sawa drio kariatasi gazetiru e'yo cuu ni o'baza ni ati ni 'da yisi
text.nyn: Kuruga omubwire bwokuranga omu mpapura za makuru.

text.eng: The whole family was shocked when my sister got pregnant at sixteen years.
text.lug: Ab'awaka bonna beewuunya muganda wange bwe yafuna olubuto ku myaka kkumi na mukaaga.
text.ach: Wi dano ma gang ocung kare ma lamera oyac ki mwaka apar wiye abicel keken.
text.teo: Abu ekale kere owumok napotuna inacika oraai ikaru itomonakanyape.
text.lgg: Ama vile akuri ndulu eca osutasi ma amvini mva isuzu de elini mudri drini aziarisi.
text.nyn: Ekiika kyona kikekanga obu munyanyazi yatungire enda aha myaka ikuuni n'amukaga.

text.eng: The agricultural sector should be improved.
text.lug: Ebyobulimi birina okutumbulwa.
text.ach: Lok ma mako lok kom pur omyero gimed rwome
text.teo: Ekot aiteteun ewai lo akoru.
text.lgg: Le ꞌba ma out arakala agirikicaniri ra
text.nyn: Ebyobuhingi n'oburiisa bishemereire kwongyerwamu amaani.

text.eng: The number of people who want to buy determines how much should be supplied.
text.lug: Omuwendo gw'abantu abaagala okugula gusalawo bungi ki obulina okuleetebwa.
text.ach: Wel luwil en aye moko dit pa jami ma omyero obed I cuk
text.teo: Erai etiai lo itunga kalu ekotosi egwelet nes itolomuni etiai lo akim na ebeit akorakin.
text.lgg: ꞌBa nga afa ofu ngopi yari ni nga ꞌi bi kalafe ꞌba lepi afa jepi ꞌdiyinirisi.
text.nyn: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikugura, nigwo gurikworeka ebishemereire kukorwa.

text.eng: An outfield player can make any number of mistakes in a game and get away with it.
text.lug: Omuzannyi azannyira ku mabbali g'ekisaawe asobola okukola ensobi ez'enjawulo mu muzannyo n'atanenyezebwa.
text.ach: Latuko ma pe tuko idyer baa ki kome twero balo tuku tyen mapol ento pe nongo lok moo keken
text.teo: Abolian lo okinga epedori adiakanar irwan ipu kotoma abolia ido emamete nu iswamaikinos.
text.lgg: Ba mupira avipi goli bipi ku ri eco ezata ndundu eyi 'ye mupira aviria azini esu panga ani ku ra
text.nyn: Omuteezi w'omupiira kuruga aheeru naabaasa kukora enshobi nyingi omu muzaano arugiramu aho.

text.eng: He was arrested on suspicion of breaking into the company office.
text.lug: Yakwatibwa olw'okuteeberezebwa nti yamenya n'ayingira mu ofiisi ya kampuni.
text.ach: Ki makke ki byek ni en aye oturo opic pa kamponi.
text.teo: Aponi ikamarai ngesi kanu alomar toma toma oyapesi loka ekampuni.
text.lgg: Ba bi eri egata nyota fizu ofisi amutiniri ma aliari ma e'yosi.
text.nyn: Bamukwatsire ahabw'okuteeberezibwa kuba ahenzire akataha omu ofiisi nza kampuni.

text.eng: They donated masks to the whole community.
text.lug: Baawa ekitundu kyonna obukookolo.
text.ach: Gumiyo mask bot dano weng
text.teo: Apotu kesi igangakisi itunga keda aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume
text.lgg: Eyi fe masiki andretia 'diyi 'ba ongulumu'a 'diyi ni dria
text.nyn: Bakagaba za masiki omu kyanga kyona.

text.eng: To treat Ebola patients and suspected cases, doctors typically isolate them in rooms.
text.lug: Okujjanjaba abalwadde ba Ebola n'abateeberezebwa, abasawo babaawulirako mu bisenge.
text.ach: Me cango lutwo Ebola ki dano mabyek me bedo ki two enoni tye I komgi, daktari koyogi I kicika mapat-pat.
text.teo: Kanu aimuke adekak nuka Ebola keda ngul luewomitai, ibusakinit imurok atiakar kes toma agolai.
text.lgg: Lezu 'ba Ebola be 'diyi atizu, ojoo yi 'ba nde yi ta mba pari yini ovuzu alenia a'dule 'diyi ma alea.
text.nyn: Okuragurira abarweire abaine ebora hamwe n'abarikuteeberezibwa kuba baine ebora, abashaho nibabaahura bonka omu kishengye kyabo.

text.eng: The prices of products usually go high due to an increase in taxes.
text.lug: Ebbeeyi y'ebintu etera okulinnya ng'emisolo girinnye.
text.ach: Wel jami kare mukene ito malo pi mucoro ma nongo kiketo lamal.
text.teo: Ikianaros itiaisinei luka iboro naarai ikianaros itiaisinei luka isolosinei.
text.lgg: Aje afa edele 'diyiniri tuni tu uru e'yo musoro otuzurinisii
text.nyn: Emihendo y'ebintu obumwe neza ahaiguru ahabw'okweyongyera omumishoro.

text.eng: The leader has rewarded the national football team for their excellent performance.
text.lug: Abakulembeze asiimye ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere olw'okukola obulungi.
text.ach: Latela omiyo mic ki lutuku odilo me lobo pi tic ma ber ma gutimo
text.teo: Abu engarenon orop etimu lo akwap lo emopira kanu aswam ejok.
text.lgg: Drice'ba 'da fe amuti mupira avipi kari 'di niri ni driadria eyi 'ba yeta kililiru risi.
text.nyn: Omwebembezi ahareize tiimu y'eihanga ekiconco ahabw'okukora gye munonga.

text.eng: He has taken the cows for grazing.
text.lug: Atutte nte ku ttale.
text.ach: En otero dyang ka kwat.
text.teo: Ayanga ngesi aituk kanu acok.
text.lgg: Eri ji ti yi onyaria
text.nyn: Yaaseetura ente.

text.eng: He called on the party members to support him.
text.lug: Yagamba ab'ekibiina kye okumuwagira.
text.ach: En olego lumemba me dul cungu iwi-bye ne me cwakke.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kolimok imeeban luka epate aingan nges.
text.lgg: Omve 'ba memba ru amuti ma alia 'diyi emuzu eri ati zu
text.nyn: Akashaba eb’ekibiina kye okumushagyika

text.eng: The car knocked down a motorcyclist at the corner of the road.
text.lug: Emmotoka yatomera omuvuzi wa pikipiki ku kkona ly'ekkubo.
text.ach: Motoka ogoyo laco mo ma tye ka ngwec ki pikipiki I kona me yo.
text.teo: Abu emotoka konang erengean epikipik kokoona loka erot.
text.lgg: Mutukari nderi si 'ba pikipiki onzupiri va nzila ma konaaleru
text.nyn: Emotoka ekatomera omuvugi w'epiki aha koona y'oruguuto.

text.eng: That candidate was disqualified for bribing voters.
text.lug: Oyo eyali yeesimbyewo yasazibwamu olw'okugulirira abalonzi.
text.ach: Kikwero ni labit kwi eni omede ki bito kwi pien en owilo lubol kwi.
text.teo: Aponi kolemarai abwoan ngol kanu aitac acakak abootin.
text.lgg: Ba nze 'ba pa sopi 'dari i raza feza ba voti be'ba 'diyi driri ma e'yosi ra
text.nyn: Nyamwesimbi akaihwa omu karuuru ahabw'okugura abateezi b'akaruru.

text.eng: Government-aided schools provide good education services.
text.lug: Amasomero ga gavumenti gasomesa bulungi.
text.ach: Gangi kwan pa gamente gimiyo kony maber me pwonye
text.teo: Isomeroi lu apugan isisianakinete ejok.
text.lgg: Sukulu gamete ni atita fezu eyidri ni 'diyi onita muke 'dinile ri fe

text.eng: What causes the high rate in Kampala?
text.lug: Kiki ekireeta omujjuzo mu Kampala?

text.teo: Inyobo eyauni aikiara ko Kampala?
text.lgg: A'du ma e'yo ni aje angiri 'diyi fe kambala ni
text.nyn: Ekirikwongyeza ebeeyi y'ebintu omu Kampala n'enki?

text.ach: Kiwaco ni minista ma preciden ocimogi pe gibedo tye I ot moko cik I cawa me timo biacara pa ot moko cik.

text.lgg: Ba ebi o'duka efe kini 'ba 'ani opele ministaru 'diyi leni fi ri e'yo kilosenini 'diyi ma alia ku
text.nyn: Kigambirwe ngu ba minisita abatoriinwe tibarikwenda kuza mu nkiko za ishengyero.

text.eng: Uganda has received vaccine donations from other countries.
text.lug: Ensi endala ziwadde Uganda eddagala erikozesebwa mu kugema.
text.ach: Lobe mukene gumiyo kony me yat agwera bot lobo Uganda.
text.teo: Adumu Uganda ikee luikisere ekato loka adeka naka ekorona kotoma akwapin ace.
text.lgg: Uganda esu aro azo atrizaniri engazu kari azi 'diyi vu ra
text.nyn: Uganda etungire  obuyambi bw'omubazi gw'okugyema kuruga omu mahanga agandi.

text.eng: The refugees request that the government responds to their needs.
text.lug: Abanoonyiboobubudamu baasabye nti gavumenti ekole ku byeetago byabwe.
text.ach: Luring ayela gilego gamente me winyo koko gi
text.teo: Ilipitos ikerai apugan abongokin nuka ipudasia kec.
text.lgg: Emunyale eyi ai gamete ni ti apezu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi fezu beni
text.nyn: Empungi zishabire Gavumenti okuhurikiza ebyetaago byaabo.

text.eng: The police are looking into kidnapping reports that are happening around Kampala.
text.lug: Poliisi etunula mu alipoota z'okuwamba bantu okwetooloola Kampala
text.ach: Abili tye ka neno matut lok ma lube ki tim bwami me mako dano pi gamo cente ma tye ka time madwong iKampala
text.teo: Ejai polis airereonor iripotan lu idadanarere itunga ko Kampala.
text.lgg: Polisi eyi e'yo one e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu eyi 'yepi kambala 'diyi ma alea
text.nyn: Aba poriisi bariyo nibacondooza ripooti y'okubuzaho abantu omu bicweka bya Kampala.

text.eng: All you do is register, open, and activate your account normally like any other platform.
text.lug: Ky'olina okukola, ggulawo era okozese akawunti yo nga ku mukutu omulala gwonna.
text.ach: Gin ma otimo en aye conne. yabo ki cako tic ki akauntti I yoo marom ki yub me kubbe mukene.
text.teo: Nubon ibusakinit jo aswam ngesi aiwadikaun, apukor, keda aitegear etosomae loka akauntikon kwape iswama jo keda iboro ice luko lago.
text.lgg: Afa lu mini 'yeri mi lu mi ru si mi tini zi mi e'do e'yo erini ece 'dayi ma vuti obi simua 'dile.
text.nyn: Eki oine kukora n'okwehandikisa, reero okaigura obuheereza obu aha simu yaawe nabwanyima okaikiriza enkozesa y'obuheereza obu nk'oku turikukira kutwaza aha buheereza obundi.

text.eng: She starved to death because nothing was there to eat.
text.lug: Enjala yamuluma okutuusa lwe yafa kubanga tewaaliwo kya kulya.
text.ach: En oto pi peko me kec pie n onongo pe tye gi mo keken me acama.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kotwana kanu etenge naarai amamei ibore yenabeit ainyam.
text.lgg: Eri of abirisi kpere draria a'disikuni afa azini de 'daa nyazaru yo
text.nyn: Akaitwa enjara ahabw'okubura kw'eky'okuta omuri kyafubire.

text.eng: A senior officer of the army has passed on.
text.lug: Waliwo omukulu mu maggye afudde.
text.ach: Lamony me rwom madit I mony otoo.
text.teo: Atwana lokapolon loka ajore.
text.lgg: Marani ma ambu azi ni dra ni
text.nyn: Ofiisa mukuru w'amahe yaafa.

text.eng: He used to be a clever boy in his primary school.
text.lug: Yalinga mulenzi mugezi bwe yali ekyali mu pulayimale.
text.ach: En onongo obedo latin maryek adada I kare ma en kwano I cukul me praimari.
text.teo: Arai ngesi esapat loaco noi najaar ngesi toma osomero loko puraimare.
text.lgg: Eri andra agupi amva ondoaruni eri vile primari sukuluarisi.
text.nyn: Akaba atuura ari omwana w'obwengye omu eishomero rye rya purayimare.

text.eng: We are patiently waiting for the installation of the street lights.
text.lug: Tulindiridde n'obugumiikiriza okuteekayo ebitala by'oku nguudo.
text.ach: Watye ka kuru mac me teng gudu ma kibi keto ni
text.teo: Ititingikit iso aidarite aibwainikino na akimian nu orotin.
text.lgg: Ama aci nzila 'diyi ma osuta te asi e'yeresi.
text.nyn: Turindiriire n'okugumisiriza, okuhisya obu barituteeraho amataara gahanguuto.

text.eng: He earns less than ten million Ugandan shillings.
text.lug: Omusaala gwe teguweza bukadde kkumi obwa ssente za Uganda.
text.ach: En nongo mucara ma pe o ciling milion apar.
text.teo: Edumununei ngesi ikapun lumam edolete imilioni itomon.
text.lgg: Eri silinga Ugnadaniri nya milioni mudri ma vutia
text.nyn: Naashashurwa empiiha ziri ahansi y'obukaikuru ikumi bw'eshiringi ya Yuganda.

text.eng: A new flat will be constructed.
text.lug: Kkalina empya ejja kuzimbibwa.
text.ach: Kibi yubu ot flat manyen
text.teo: Eponio aiduk egoropa loitetet.
text.lgg: Ba nga gorofa o'diru ni si
text.nyn: Kanyinaibiri ensya neija kwombekwa.

text.eng: The rate of maternal mortality is increasing.
text.lug: Omuwendo gw'abakyala b'embuto abafa nga bali mbuto, nga bazaala, oba nga baakamala okuzaala kweyongera.
text.ach: wel mon matye ka too ikare me nywal tye ka mede
text.teo: Iyatas atwakisia nuka angor kanu edook.
text.lgg: E'yo oku eyini odrazu osiria ri ma kalafe ni tutu
text.nyn: Omuhendo gw'abakazi abarikufa nibazaara, gweyongyeire.

text.eng: What is the role played by local leaders in the community?
text.lug: Abakulembeze b'ekyalo bakola mulimu ki?
text.ach: Lutela mapiny ma kabedo ma orumowa ticgi obedo me timo gin ango?
text.teo: Ani bo aswam naejaatatar engarenok luko atutubet?
text.lgg: Azi drileka aku eselesi 'diyini 'yeleri a'dini?
text.nyn: Ni mugasho ki ogu abeebembezi b'ahansi baine omukyanga.

text.eng: The residents complained about the small parking yard at the supermarket.
text.lug: Abantu b'omu kitundu beemulugunya olw'okuba awasimba ebidduka ku ssemaduuka wafunda nnyo,
text.ach: Dano mapol gitye ka lok matek pi nok pa kabedo me gwoko mutokagi i supre market.
text.teo: Apotu itunga luka atutubet kongurianata kanu aiboisit naedit neisiboununere amotokan kotoma oiduka lokapolon.
text.lgg: Ba angua ma alia 'diyi ono pari gakandiaru 'bani ku mutukari otizuri ma e'yosi
text.nyn: Abataka baketomboita ahabw'omwanya mukye gw'okumpaakingaho aha ahanduka.

text.eng: We should always learn from our past mistakes.
text.lug: Bulijjo tulina okuyigira mu nsobi zaffe ezaayita.
text.ach: Omyero wanong pwony ki ijami maracu ma watimo ikare mukato angec
text.teo: Ekot duc asisiaunun kotoma adiakanareta wok.
text.lgg: Le ama ma oni ki e'yo eyi engazu ama ezata driyo 'diyi vu.
text.nyn: Tushemereire kwegyera aha nshobi ezi twakozire kare.

text.eng: Farmers should be subsidized in order to increase their profits.
text.lug: Abalimi balina okuwewulwa kw'ebyo bye basaasaanyizaako okusobola okwongeza ku magoba gaabwe.
text.ach: Lupur omyero gikonygi gidwok wel piny igi wek magoba maginongo omede
text.teo: Ekot akoriok atacenen kanu aiyatakin ameda kec.
text.lgg: Le ꞌba ma fe ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyini aje ori yini ꞌdiyi were yini ngazu orodri esuzu beni
text.nyn: Abahingi bashemereire kugura eby'okukozesa aha beeyi y'ahansi kugira ngu amagoba geyongyere.

text.eng: The minister of sports has officially opened the school sports competition.
text.lug: Minisita w'ebyemizannyo mu butongole aguddewo empaka z'amasomero ez'ebyemizannyo.
text.ach: Ladit ma loyo gang kal me tuku oyabu yub me pyem tuku i kin gangi kwan
text.teo: Abu eminista lo aboliasio opuko abolobol naka aboliasio kosomeron.
text.lgg: Minisita avita niri zi abala avita ndundu eyini 'diyi ma ti 'bo.
text.nyn: Minisita w'eby'emizaano, aigwiireho empaka z'amashomero omubutongore.

text.eng: She qualified for the international golf competition.
text.lug: Yayiseemu okugenda mu mpaka z'omuzannyo gwa goofu ez'ensi yonna.
text.ach: Otuku maber oweko oporre me cito I pyem tuku me golf.
text.teo: Abu ngesi koloma toma abolobol naka akwap kere naka abolia naka golf.
text.lgg: Aga muzu abala gofuni kari  eselea international gold competition niria ra.
text.nyn: Akarabamu kuza omu mpaka za gorufu ez'ensi yoona.

text.eng: Kampala capital city authority football club got their first away win this season.
text.lug: Ttiimu y'omupiira eya Kampala Capital city authority yafuna okuwangula kwayo okwasooka sizoni eno.
text.ach: Dul tuku me odilo me Kampala Capital city authority gunongo loc gi me acel ikare me pyem eni
text.teo: Abu etimu loka  Atukot naeyait ainapeta ko Kampala odum aitelekar kec nasodit kokinga apakio nu.
text.lgg: Amuti mupira avizu Kampala capital city authority niri ndeki eyivile abala oko amuti azi nduni eyivu akua ri 'bo abala eyini e'dozu.
text.nyn: Kiraabu y'omupiira ey'Ekitongore Ekirikureeberera Orurembo Kampala, yaasingura omuzaano gw'okubanza aheeru y'ekizaaniro kyabo, omu siizoni egi.

text.eng: The two rival officials suspended their campaigns.
text.lug: Abakungu ababiri abavuganya baayimiriza kampeyini zaabwe.
text.ach: Luloc aryo ma gitye kapyem gujuko bito kwigi woko.
text.teo: Apotu abwoak iarei lueboloboloete kisukunyasi ikapeinisikec.
text.lgg: Ba iri ageti otizani 'diyi ku ti odaza yiniri ja.
text.nyn: Ababaire nibahakahakana babiri bakangyezayo za kampiini zaabo

text.eng: The voter registers should be displayed at the parishes.
text.lug: Enkalala z'abalonzi zirina okutimbibwa ku parisi.
text.ach: Bul me nying lubol kwir myero kinyut I paric weng.
text.teo: Ibusakinit aitodiar eitabo loka aiwadikao kotelai.

text.eng: Football supporters like a winning team.

text.lgg: Ba atita fepi amuti mupira avipi 'diyi dri 'diyi le amuti ndepira 'diyi.
text.nyn: Abahagizi b'omupiira nibakunda tiimu erikusinga.

text.eng: There are many music students in higher institutions of higher learning.
text.lug: Waliwo abayizi bangi abasoma okuyimba mu matendekero ga waggulu.
text.ach: Lutino kwan mapol tye ka kwano lok me wee igangi kwan me rwom me rwom ma malo
text.teo: Ipu awook lu eraas esisiak kosomeroi lukokuju.
text.lgg: Sukulu anzi e'yo onipi ongo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma kalafe sukulu onita ni uruleru 'diyi ma alea karakara
text.nyn: Hariho abeegi baingi abarikushoma eby'okweshongora omu matendekyero ag'ahaiguru.

text.eng: I was shocked when I was told that my father had died.
text.lug: Nafunamu ekyekango bwe nagambibwa nti taata wange yali afudde .
text.ach: Kwena too pa wora omako wiya totwal
text.teo: Abu eong ariengu ne alimokinere eong ebe atwana papaka.
text.lgg: Ma eca osuta si 'bani 'yozu mani ma ati dra ra risi
text.nyn: Nkatiina munonga ku naahuriire ngu taata afiire.

text.eng: Thank God for all the good things.
text.lug: Weebaze Katonda olw'ebirungi byonna .
text.ach: Pwoo Lubanga pi jami ducu ma beco
text.teo: Isiyalamik Lokasuban kanu iboro luajokak.
text.lgg: Awa'difo Munguni e'yo muke 'diyisi dria
text.nyn: Siima Ruhanga ahabw'ebirungi byona.

text.eng: A good working relationship yields positive results in the community.
text.lug: Enkolagana ennungi evaamu ebintu ebirungi mu kitundu.
text.ach: Tic maber matye ki wat maber kelo adwoki maber i kabedo moni
text.teo: Aiswamanara najokan eyauni ameda naejok otunga.
text.lgg: Aa'ta azi tia muke ri ni agata muke 'diyi eji ongulumu ma alea
text.nyn: Enkorengana nungi ahagati y'abakozi, nerugwamu ebirungi omu kyanga.

text.eng: The revenue-maximizing goal was to reach the largest audience possible.
text.lug: Ekigendererwa ky'okusoolooza kwali kutuukirira muwendo munene nga bwekisoboka.
text.ach: Miti me nongo magoba mapol loyo onongo kimito ni oo bot ltii ki long angeya mapol
text.teo: Alosikinet naka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun arai kanu adolokin itunga luipu.
text.lgg: Asisile afa isuzari ma ongmbo otuzuri ndra cazu 'ba karkarawu yi vu
text.nyn: Ekitekateeko ky’okukanyisa esente kikecumintiriza aha kuhitsya obuhereza abantu baingi.

text.eng: He said ill words to his wife.
text.lug: Yagamba mukazi ebigambo ebibi.
text.ach: En oloko jami maraco bot dakone.
text.teo: Abu ngesi iner akiro nuarokok nuikamunitos akeberu.
text.lgg: Eri ofu e'yo onzikanyaru 'diyi i okuni dri'i
text.nyn: Akagamba ebigambo bibi aha muhara.

text.eng: He was reported to the police.
text.lug: Yawawaabirwa ku poliisi.
text.ach: Kidote bot abili.
text.teo: Aponi kolimorai ngesi polis.
text.lgg: Ba ji eri ma e'yo olu polisi dri
text.nyn: Bakamuhababira aha pooriisi.

text.eng: She tried to chase the thief but all in vain.
text.lug: Yagezaako okugoba omubbi naye tekyasoboka.
text.ach: En otemo ryemo ko lakwo ento pe olare
text.teo: Abu ngesi otam aibwapakin ekokolan konye tai.
text.lgg: Eri o'bi ogua 'da odro ra te o'bi ti
text.nyn: Akagyezaho kwiruka aha mushuma kwonka byaba eby'abusha.

text.eng: We have since remained very close to personal and family friends.
text.lug: Okuva olwo, ffe ne famire yaabwe twafuuka ba mukwano nnyo.
text.ach: Cako eca wan I kinwa kacel ki gangiwa bene odong lurem.
text.teo: Isalaki sio irai ipapero luidicanara noi kwape ikalia keda kwape idiopediopen.
text.lgg: Ama asi awi agyii azi eyo obii ti ni ru ama esele family amani 'diyi be
text.nyn: Kuruga obwe tutwaire turi abanywani b’ahamaara kandi ari namunywana w’ekiika kyeitu

text.eng: A number of children have grown up without fathers.

text.ach: Lutino mapol gudongo labongo wegigi.
text.teo: Idwe luipu epolounitos komamete luapapakec.
text.lgg: Anzi kalafesini zo ata kokoru 'bo
text.nyn: Abaana bingi bakuzire batiine ba ishe.

text.eng: The sports event will take place at the school's playground.

text.teo: Epote aboliasio ajaikin toma oisawe loka abolia loka esomero.

text.eng: Some health workers are very rude to their patients.

text.teo: Imurok luka adekis ice ededeng noi mama ejaasi adekakac.
text.lgg: Azi'ba alatani 'diyi ma azi yi dri agararu 'ba azoru 'diyi be
text.nyn: Abashaho abamwe nibagambira kubi abarwire baabo.

text.eng: Who killed the martyrs?
text.lug: Ani yatta abajulizi?
text.ach: Anga ma oneko lucaden remo?
text.teo: Ingai bo abu koyar itunga kanuka aiyuunikec?
text.lgg: A'di o'di 'ba 'bani o'dile a'ita yini ma e'yosi Uganda Martyrs ru 'diyi ni?
text.nyn: N'oha owaisire abajurizi?

text.eng: Entebbe is one of the cleanest towns in the country.
text.lug: Entebbe kye kimu ku bibuga ebisinga obuyonjo mu ggwanga.
text.ach: Entebbe tye ikin town maleng loyo ilobo ni
text.teo: Entebbe nes erai etaun lo elai kakere.

text.nyn: Entebbe n'emwe aha ndembo ezirikukirayo obuyonjo omuwihanga.

text.eng: Politicians should respect the Constitution.
text.lug: Bannabyabufuzi balina okussa ekitiibwa mu ssemateeka.
text.ach: Lucung i wibye myro guwor adwol megi.
text.teo: Ibusakinit itunga luka politikis ayongit ekisil.
text.lgg: Ba politikini 'diyi ma inzi a'yota kariniri ci
text.nyn: Ab'eby'obutegyeki baheereze ebiragiro ekitiinisa.

text.eng: What has happened to the light in your room?
text.lug: Ekitangaala eky'omu kisenge kyo kibadde ki?
text.ach: Ngo ma otimme ki mac me ot megi.
text.teo: Inyoin bo atakaniki aica naka etogokon?
text.lgg: A'di 'ye diza mivile jo aliari ni?
text.nyn: Etaari eri omu kishegye kyawe yabaki?

text.eng: Generally, military expenditure in Africa fell by eight percent.
text.lug: Okutwaliza awamu ensaasaanya y'amagye mu Afirika yakka ebitundu munaana ku buli kikumi.
text.ach: I kabedo weng, lim pa kitiyo kwede I lok me mony I lobo del col odok piny ki percent aboro
text.teo: Kotoma abeit, ikapun luitosomao kajore abu kibiror keda ikanyauni kotoma angolikwatat.
text.lgg: Driasiria, afa ayuza e'yo marani 'diyi ma dria Africaari ede ongmbo aro tur dria si
text.nyn: Omubumwe,enshohoza y’amahe omuri Afirika ekakyendeera obucweeka munaana ahari igana.

text.eng: She sacrificed her goat to the ancestors.
text.lug: Yasaddako embuzi ye mu ba jjaja.
text.ach: En otyero dyegi ne bot kwari ne ma yam con
text.teo: Abu ngesi oyar akinei ke kanu asuban.
text.lgg: Eri fe i ma Indri edeta ru eri ma a'bipika eyi dri
text.nyn: Embuzi ye, akagihongyera baishenkuru.

text.eng: He promised to give us a bonus if we bought from him the next time.
text.lug: Yatusuubiza okutwongeza singa tumugulako omulundi omulala.
text.ach: En okwonge me medo wiye ka wadwogo nino mukene ka wilo jami bote.
text.teo: Abu ngesi isumun ainakin kesi aiyatakinet arai ebongutu kesi agwel koidukake.
text.lgg: Eri so oyo ama dri atua fezu ra ama ka afa je eri vu sawa vilerisi raria
text.nyn: Akaturaganisa kutuha akasiimo ku turaagakye kugura omu duuka ye ogundi murundi.

text.eng: The stone broke into extra smaller pieces.
text.lug: Ejjinja lyamenyekamenyekamu obutundutundu obutono.
text.ach: Kidi ne ongeny i ngido ngido matino-tino.
text.teo: Abu amoru kobwanga kotoma atutubena nudidik noi.
text.lgg: Oni onyo i nyingirikia efifiru
text.nyn: Eibare rikashatuka ryarugamu obundi bucweeka bukye.

text.eng: Uganda has never qualified for the World Cup finals.
text.lug: Uganda teyitangamu kuzannya ogw'akamalirizo mu kikopo ky'ensi yonna.
text.ach: Uganda pe ya okato me cito ka tuko tuko me agiki me tuko odilo me wilobo ducu.
text.teo: Mam Uganda elomaritor toma aboliasio nuka awasia nuka eikopo loka akwap.
text.lgg: Uganda agani nga drio fizu avita kopo wudrikurusirini asizuri ma alia ku.
text.nyn: Yuganda tekarabagamu okuza ahampaka eza ahamuheru ez'ekikopo eky'ensi yoona.

text.eng: They were not eligible to start an account.
text.lug: Baali tebasaaanidde kuggulawo akawunti
text.ach: Onongo cik pe yee ni guyab account
text.teo: Mam kes akapakina angar account.
text.lgg: Eyi vu afa 'bani lele akawunti nzizu 'diyi ndra yo

text.lgg: Ba aku ambo o'diru 'diyi ede kari 'di ma alea e'yo azakoma feza o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu
text.nyn: Endembo ensya ziriyo nizitandikwaho omwihanga, okutunguura omutindo gw'empereza.

text.eng: Training opportunities should be provided to empower refugees.
text.lug: Emikisa gy'okutendekebwa giteekeddwa okuweebwa okutumbula abanoonyiboobubudamu
text.ach: Omyero ki mii gum me pwonye ki luring ayela wek omed kerogi
text.teo: Ekot aijaikin arerengesio nu aitutuoro kanu aitigogongio ikerai.
text.lgg: Le 'ba ma fe drileba imbatani 'diyi okpo fezu emunyale eyini
text.nyn: Empungi bashemereire kutendekwa bakatunga emyoga erabahwere.

text.eng: The president did not appear at the event.
text.lug: Pulezidenti teyaliiwo.
text.ach: Ladit lobo ne pe obino I kwerne.
text.teo: Mam lokapolon akwap abu kojaikin airiamunet ngin.
text.lgg: Ba kari ma drileru ri ma ngulupi e'da ni e'yo nde ma alia ku
text.nyn: Purezidenti t'arareebekire ha mukoro.

text.eng: The journalist gave a full report of the story.
text.lug: Munnamawulire yawa alipoota enzijuvu ku nsonga eyo.
text.ach: Lacoo lok angea ne omiyo ngec matut I kom lok ne.
text.teo: Abu arotan iyemuto kiner akiro kaidules.
text.lgg: Ba osisia niri fe o'duko dria e'yo nde niri ra
text.nyn: Abanyamahurire bakaha ripoota eijwire aha nshonga.

text.eng: They will be punished if they don't do their work.
text.lug: Bajja kubonerezebwa singa tebakola mulimu gwabwe.
text.ach: Kibiminigi pwod ka gutimo ticgi.
text.teo: Eponio alecor kesi arai mam kesi iswamaete aswamukec.
text.lgg: Ba nga panga fe yi dri ra ka azi yini nga ku ria
text.nyn: Nibaija kubonerezibwa baaba bataherize emirimo yaabo.

text.eng: An ostrich has the longest legs.
text.lug: Mmaaya erina amagulu agasingayo obuwanvu.
text.ach: Udu obedo winyo ma tyene boco loyo.
text.teo: Ejaasi akulu keda akeje nuewojak kakere.
text.lgg: Okondo ma pa zo ezu ndeni.
text.nyn: Maaya niyo aine amaguru agarikukirayo oburaingwa.

text.eng: People with similar origins work well together.
text.lug: Abantu abasibuka mu bitundu bye bimu kibanguyira okukolera awamu.
text.ach: Dano ma aa kamarom tiyo maber kacel.
text.teo: Itunga luelomunitos kotoma aiboisit adiope etapit aswm nepepe ejokuna.
text.lgg: Ba enga 'ba vuti alu si 'diyi azi nga onyiru tualu
text.nyn: Abantu abarikuruga hamwe nibakora hamwe kurungi.

text.eng: He came in third place with thirty votes.
text.lug: Yakwata kya kusatu n'obululu asatu.
text.ach: En obedp namba adek ki kwi pyeradek.
text.teo: Abu ngesi koraun loiuniet lojaasi keda abootin akaisauni.
text.lgg: Eri emu pari nazuria voti be kali na
text.nyn: Akazira omu mwanya gwa kashatu n'oburuuru makumi ashatu

text.eng: National Resistance Movement leaders in Kampala were to air out their issues.
text.lug: Abakulembeze ba National Resistance Movement mu Kampala baabadde baakwanja ensonga zaabwe.
text.ach: Ludito me National Resistane Movement ma I kampala onongo omyero guwac lok ma icwinygi
text.teo: Abeit engarenok luka epate Loka Museveni airiamun kanu aitetem aomisokec.
text.lgg: Drileka amuti National Resistance Movement ni Kampalaa 'diyi te 'ye e'yo yi be 'diyi 'ba amve
text.nyn: Abeebembezi b'ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekya National Resistance Movement babaire nibaza kuhayo enshonga zaabo.

text.eng: The ministry of health recommends that all water for drinking should be boiled.
text.lug: Minisitule y'ebyobulamu esemba nti amazzi g'okunywa gonna gayina okufumbibwa.
text.ach: Minictry me yot kom waco ni pii amata weng omyero kong ki ted
text.teo: Icorakit erionget loka angaleu akipi kere nu amasio ekot aidor.
text.lgg: Okalamvu alataniri ai kini 'ba ma a'di yi mvuza dria a'di a'di
text.nyn: Minisiture y'ebyamagara, neehabura ngu amaizi g'okunywa goona baateeke.

text.eng: The high influx of refugees is likely to encourage the spread of the disease.
text.lug: Okweyongera okw'abanoonyiboobubudamu kwandiviirako okusaasaana kw'obulwadde.
text.ach: Medde pa luring ayella I kabedo ni omaro medo nya pa two ni
text.teo: Aipuar na ikerak emina aiyatakin akora na adeka.
text.lgg: Emunyale eyi ma emuta okposi ri eco fe azo 'da ni i erezu ra.
text.nyn: Okweyongyera kw'empungi ezirikwija omu ihanga, nikubaasa kujanjaza endwara.

text.eng: The Founding Fathers made "out of many ones" the national motto.
text.lug: Abasajja abaasooka baalonda mu nyingi nebafuna engombo y'eggwanga.
text.ach: Dano ma gucako dul man kuketo "acel ikom madwong" macalo lubaro me lobo
text.teo: Abu Atukot Naka Luka Papap kiswamautu akou naka akirot "idiope kama ejaasi luipu."
text.lgg: Ba vuti ni e'do 'ba 'diyi 'ba "tre ma alia alu" o'dupeza kari niri ru
text.nyn: Abakitandikireho bakaihamu kimwe “mooto y’ihanga”

text.eng: In most sports games, there is always a team member defending an opponent.
text.lug: Mu mizannyo egisinga obungi, mu ttiimu mutera okubaamu omuzannyi atangira omulabe.
text.ach: I pol pa tuko, team acel wang ma oloyo lawote.
text.teo: Kotoma aboliasio nuipu, ejai duc emeeba loka etimu loitiji etepegan.
text.lgg: Avita pari yi ma alia, memba azini amutinini sawa driasi pa so 'ba ageti atipini arizu ci
text.nyn: Omuri ibara muzaano haba harimu omuzaani oba naagyezaho kuremesa omuteebi.

text.eng: The team won three games in the league.
text.lug: Ttiimu yawangudde emipiira esatu mu liigi.
text.ach: Team odiloni oloyo tuko adek ki gurup tuko odilo man.
text.teo: Abu etimu ngol iteleka aboliasio auni kotoma abolobol.
text.lgg: Amuti nderi nde avita league ma alia na.
text.nyn: Tiimu ekahangura emizaano eshatu omu mpaka

text.eng: Poland was granted deep relief on its debts.
text.lug: Poland yaweebwa okuwummuzibwamu mu mabanja.
text.ach: Kiweko wel den madit tutwal ma obedo iwi lobo Poland.
text.teo: Aponi kalakunai Poland kanuka apeseninike.
text.lgg: Kari Poland, isu andra azakoma mari ofezu ra.
text.nyn: Poland ekaheebwa okwirukangirirwa kw’amaani  aha mabanja gayo.

text.eng: The two leaders held a meeting to discuss the development of their regions.
text.lug: Abakulembeze ababiri baafunye olukungaana okwogera ku nkulaakulana mu kitundu kyabwe.
text.ach: Lutela aryo-ni gurwate me nyamo lok I kom dongo lobo me rijongi.
text.teo: Apotu engarenok kojaikinos keda airiamunet kanu aitetem apol naka ariinokec.
text.lgg: Drile iri 'diyi 'ye dri fuza e'yo angu kala yini 'diyi ma ezozani 'diyi onzezu
text.nyn: Abeebembezi bombi bakagira orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha by'entunguuka y'ebicweka byabo.

text.eng: The kraal is dirty, please clean it.
text.lug: Ekiraalo kikyafu, kirongoose.
text.ach: Akul dyangi ne col tutwal, wutim-ber wuywee cilo me
text.teo: Erono aujo noi, kolot italau.
text.lgg: Lico nderi ondiru, kirikirisi mi ini eri ra.
text.nyn: Ekiraaro n'ekirofa,kiyonje.

text.eng: Poor pay leads to crime.
text.lug: Ensasula embi ereetera emisango.
text.ach: Cul ma rac weko dano timo bal
text.teo: Atacio naronon eyauni akoko.
text.lgg: Musara omgbo were ri ni fe 'ba eyini e'yo onzi eyi 'yezu ni
text.nyn: Okushashurwa kubi nikureetera abantu kukora ebihagaro.

text.eng: There is good security in the city.
text.lug: Eby'okwerinda birungi mu kibuga.
text.ach: Gwoko kuc tye I rwom me lamal I boma ne.
text.teo: Ejai ayuwara naejok noi kosite.
text.lgg: Agei tema aku ambu ma aleari onyiru.
text.nyn: Hariho ebyokweriinda  birungi omu rureembo.

text.eng: If they did not comply more pliant people would be found.
text.lug: Singa tebakkiriza, abantu abalala abasendebwasendebwa bandisangiddwa.
text.ach: Ka onongo pe guye, onongo kono kinongo dano mukene ma tic kwedgi yot
text.teo: Arai mam kesi ecamunete epote itunga luitepegitos luipu alomun.
text.lgg: Ka andra e'yo nde atii ku 'ba ndra 'ba badi badi 'diyi azi isu 'dika
text.nyn: Kuri nookgira ngu tibaraikiriize, bakaba nibaza kubona abandi abaraikirize.

text.eng: When locusts attack the crops, they destroy the whole agricultural economy.
text.lug: Enzige bwe zirumba ebirime, zoonoona ebyobulimi byonna.
text.ach: Ka otwongo ocamo jami apura, eni tye ki adwoki marac i kom lobo wa ilok me biacara
text.teo: Ne esurokina emase ikorion, enyamarete ikorion kere lu ekotore adumunia ikapun.
text.lgg: Ombi eyi ka nyaka eyi nya, eyi robia esu agirikica siri eza teketeke.
text.nyn: Enzigye kuzirikutaahirira ebihingwa, nizishiisha byona ebirikuruga omubuhingi.

text.eng: Different African countries have their special dishes.
text.lug: Abantu mu nsi ezitali zimu mu Afirika balina ebika by'emmere bya njawulo bye basinga okuwoomerwa.
text.ach: Lobo mapat-pat me Africa tye ki cam meggi mapigi tego botgi.
text.teo: Akwapin nuegelegela ejaasi keda inyamat lueminasi kesi.
text.lgg: Kari Africani ndu ndu 'diyi ma nyaka yini le avasi 'diyi ci.
text.nyn: Amahanga agatari gamw na gamwe omu africa geine emere zitarikushushana.

text.eng: Developed countries have good medical facilities.
text.lug: Ensi ezaakula edda zirina amalwaliro amalungi.
text.ach: Lobe ma gudongo gitye ki odi yadi mabeco adada.
text.teo: Akwapin nuepolok ejaasi keda aijaanakin naka amukian naejok noi.
text.lgg: Kari zo'ba 'bo 'diyi ma angu aroni 'diyi onyiru
text.nyn: Amahanga agakurakuriine giine amarwariro marungi.

text.eng: New Zealand has won the rugby world cup five times in a row.
text.lug: New Zealand ewangudde ekikopo ky'ensi yonna eky'omuzannyo gwa ragibe emirundi ettaano egy'omuddiringaanwa.
text.ach: Lobo New Zealand otero kikopo me tuko rugby me wilobo tye abic teretere.
text.teo: Eteleka New Zealand aboliasio eikopo loka akwap kere nuka rugby irwan akany nuetuputupasi.
text.lgg: New Zealand nde rugby world cup pale towi ndekokoru.
text.nyn: New Zealand esingire ekikopo ky'empaka z'okubaka okwabashaija emyaka etaano ekuratiine.

text.eng: Most primary school teachers are not satisfied with their salaries.
text.lug: Abasomesa abasinga obungi aba pulayimale sibamativu n'omusaala gwaabwe.
text.ach: Pol pa lupwonye me praimari cwinygi pe yom ki mucara ma giculugi kwede.
text.teo: Mam esisianakinak luko opuraimare eyalamasi keda iropitokec.
text.lgg: Emba'ba pramari sukuluni 'diyi ma pari apini yi vile oya yisi ku
text.nyn: Abeegyesa bingi ba puriimare tibamazirwe n'emishaara yaabo.

text.eng: There is continued heavy gunfire in the Democratic Republic of Congo town of Beni.
text.lug: Waliwo okubwatuka kw'amasasi okugenda mu maaso mu kibuga kya Democratic Republic of Congo eky'e Beni.
text.ach: Kwoc pe muduku madongo tye ka mede I town me Beni ma tye I Democratic Republic me Congo
text.teo: Ejai etosomae loka imudun koCongo Beni
text.lgg: Osu gbiza ni mu 'dani'da kari Democratic Republic Congo niri vile tawuni Beni niria.
text.nyn: Okurwana kw'amaani nikugumizamui omuri DRC omu rurembo rwa Beni.

text.eng: The little children waved at their parents while leaving.
text.lug: Abaana abato baawuubira bazadde baabwe emikono bwe baali bagenda.
text.ach: Lutino matino giwito cingi me moto lunyodogi ka gia ki paco.
text.teo: Apotu idwe iyogata auriakake nautatar alosit.
text.lgg: Anzinyiri nde 'diyi ya dri yima tipika yini dri koria.
text.nyn: Abaana bakahubira emikono abazaire baabo obuba baire barikugyenda.
